snippet.title: Rosenkreuzstilette Trailer
snippet.description:
Some time ago I made a trailer for RosenkryezStilette, of all my work it's possibly my favorite. Now that the gae is finally receiving an English release it seems a good time for a fancy new trailer with some English text in it. The text is referring to the game's story and how the Holy Empire treats the Rosenkreuz, and could not possibly be me taking pot shots at any other Megaman-based games or anything. *cough* Mighty Number *cough cough* Nine.

The game plays like Megaman, and has a very Castlevania - like aesthetic in places, though it draws inspiration from a variety of other...   Wait, why am I explaining this? You can see this for yourself in the video. Surely I'm not just making excuses to slip in the names of similar 8-bit and 16-bit games so Youtube's search algorithms have something to latch on to...      Also might I say the games graphics look like something found on the NES though with more shades of color so I guess I should say SNES, or maybe Sega Genesis. 

Oh and I guess I should probably include a link to their steam page : http://store.steampowered.com/app/564150/

Also here's my previous trailer that I mentioned : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FhKOZTcM7pQ&index=28&list=PLSQLREUw9vwmE8HYXkE0uYgR6ur64hjIQ


My digital tips jar : https://www.patreon.com/Hadriex
I'm on Steam: http://steamcommunity.com/id/Hadriex/
I'm also on Minds.com: https://www.minds.com/Hadriex
And Twitter: https://twitter.com/Hadriex/
Hadriex Discord community: https://discord.gg/FFDSjch
